#summary A brief introduction to tc-ext-tools.

= Introduction =

tc-ext-tools is an extension build system developed to run under Tiny Core Linux. The main aim aim of the project is to provide a high-level, easy extension maintenance system for TCL package maintainers. One of the best designs of tc-ext-tools is to host package build files in an svn repository thus all the information to build a package is publicly available to everyone.
